line.comment: * Mayhem 2.9.13
* debug mode
* set global variable: name='mayhem_corruptionSwitch' value=[TRUE]
* set global variable: name='mayhem_riftSwitch' value=[TRUE]
* set global variable: name='mayhem_insuranceSwitch' value=[TRUE]
* Initialization (each load)
* Init
* MAYHEM 1.0
* MAYHEM 2.0
* Marines improvements arbitrary values
* If you change this, remember to change Mayhem.GetWorkshopInfo.
* Shield arbitrary values
* Toolkit.
* global secondary signal map: remove signal=[SIGNAL_CHANGESECTOR] race=[Player] class=[Moveable Ship] name='Mayhem_SignalDistressCalls'
* global secondary signal map: add signal=[SIGNAL_CHANGESECTOR] race=[Player] class=[Moveable Ship] script='Mayhem.Signal.DistressCalls' prio=0 name='Mayhem_SignalDistressCalls'
* global secondary signal map: remove signal=[SIGNAL_DOCKED] race=[Player] class=[Moveable Ship] name='Mayhem_SignalDistressCallsTaxi'
* global secondary signal map: add signal=[SIGNAL_DOCKED] race=[Player] class=[Moveable Ship] script='Mayhem.Signal.DistressCalls.Taxi.Dock' prio=0 name='Mayhem_SignalDistressCallsTaxi'
* global secondary signal map: remove signal=[SIGNAL_DOCKED] race=[Player] class=[Moveable Ship] name='Mayhem_SignalDistressCallsDelivery'
* global secondary signal map: add signal=[SIGNAL_DOCKED] race=[Player] class=[Moveable Ship] script='Mayhem.Signal.DistressCalls.Delivery.Dock' prio=0 name='Mayhem_SignalDistressCallsDelivery'
* global secondary signal map: remove signal=[SIGNAL_DOCKED] race=null class=[Moveable Ship] name='Mayhem_SignalCorruptionDocked'
* global secondary signal map: add signal=[SIGNAL_DOCKED] race=null class=[Moveable Ship] script='Mayhem.Signal.Corruption.Docked' prio=0 name='Mayhem_SignalCorruptionDocked'
* global secondary signal map: remove signal=[SIGNAL_KILLED] race=null class=[TL] name='Mayhem_SignalCorruptionKilled'
* global secondary signal map: add signal=[SIGNAL_KILLED] race=null class=[TL] script='Mayhem.Signal.Corruption.Killed' prio=0 name='Mayhem_SignalCorruptionKilled'
* global secondary signal map: remove signal=[SIGNAL_ATTACKED] race=null class=[Moveable Ship] name='Mayhem_ShipAttacked'
* global secondary signal map: add signal=[SIGNAL_ATTACKED] race=null class=[Moveable Ship] script='Mayhem.Signal.Attacked' prio=0 name='Mayhem_ShipAttacked'
* Toolkit.
* reset menu safeties
* Safety to remove Jumpdrives if needed.
* Toolkit.
* Make sure all races are enemies to bad guys.
* Purge some claiming races that are not present in the sector anymore (and nobody is defending it).
* Make sure all shipyards and research stations are running their scripts.
* Discover every ship in the encyclopedia.
* Remove QJE and MK3, and jumpdrive if needed

line.text: 'Sorry my love, your game is fucked. Super Panda.'

line.comment: * Marines were not properly killed in earlier versions.
* There's no expedition in progress.
* There's an expedition in progress.
* Also updates new Opportune deliveries option.

line.text: 'Mayhem 2.7.0: all perks have been reset. Lists of previous perks can be found in your message log.'
'Mayhem 2.9.0: Due to a previous bug, your scraps have been reset to 0. Sorry!'
'Mayhem 2.9.9: Due to a critical bug in previous versions, all your patrol fleets have been reset.'

line.comment: * same as in Mayhem.Signal.Story
* invasions are possible when the relation is [Neutral]
* = [NULL] -> call script 'Mayhem.SetRelation': race1=$race race2=[Teladi] relation=[Neutral]

sval.val: Sorry my love, your game is fucked. Super Panda.
Mayhem 2.7.0: all perks have been reset. Lists of previous perks can be found in your message log.
Mayhem 2.9.0: Due to a previous bug, your scraps have been reset to 0. Sorry!
Mayhem 2.9.9: Due to a critical bug in previous versions, all your patrol fleets have been reset.
If you change this, remember to change Mayhem.GetWorkshopInfo.
global secondary signal map: remove signal=[SIGNAL_CHANGESECTOR] race=[Player] class=[Moveable Ship] name='Mayhem_SignalDistressCalls'
global secondary signal map: add signal=[SIGNAL_CHANGESECTOR] race=[Player] class=[Moveable Ship] script='Mayhem.Signal.DistressCalls' prio=0 name='Mayhem_SignalDistressCalls'
global secondary signal map: remove signal=[SIGNAL_DOCKED] race=[Player] class=[Moveable Ship] name='Mayhem_SignalDistressCallsTaxi'
global secondary signal map: add signal=[SIGNAL_DOCKED] race=[Player] class=[Moveable Ship] script='Mayhem.Signal.DistressCalls.Taxi.Dock' prio=0 name='Mayhem_SignalDistressCallsTaxi'
global secondary signal map: remove signal=[SIGNAL_DOCKED] race=[Player] class=[Moveable Ship] name='Mayhem_SignalDistressCallsDelivery'
global secondary signal map: add signal=[SIGNAL_DOCKED] race=[Player] class=[Moveable Ship] script='Mayhem.Signal.DistressCalls.Delivery.Dock' prio=0 name='Mayhem_SignalDistressCallsDelivery'
global secondary signal map: remove signal=[SIGNAL_DOCKED] race=null class=[Moveable Ship] name='Mayhem_SignalCorruptionDocked'
global secondary signal map: add signal=[SIGNAL_DOCKED] race=null class=[Moveable Ship] script='Mayhem.Signal.Corruption.Docked' prio=0 name='Mayhem_SignalCorruptionDocked'
global secondary signal map: remove signal=[SIGNAL_KILLED] race=null class=[TL] name='Mayhem_SignalCorruptionKilled'
global secondary signal map: add signal=[SIGNAL_KILLED] race=null class=[TL] script='Mayhem.Signal.Corruption.Killed' prio=0 name='Mayhem_SignalCorruptionKilled'
global secondary signal map: remove signal=[SIGNAL_ATTACKED] race=null class=[Moveable Ship] name='Mayhem_ShipAttacked'
global secondary signal map: add signal=[SIGNAL_ATTACKED] race=null class=[Moveable Ship] script='Mayhem.Signal.Attacked' prio=0 name='Mayhem_ShipAttacked'
Safety to remove Jumpdrives if needed.
Make sure all races are enemies to bad guys.
Purge some claiming races that are not present in the sector anymore (and nobody is defending it).
Make sure all shipyards and research stations are running their scripts.
Discover every ship in the encyclopedia.
Remove QJE and MK3, and jumpdrive if needed
Marines were not properly killed in earlier versions.
Also updates new Opportune deliveries option.
invasions are possible when the relation is [Neutral]
